article.title: Status and history for tam
article.para: No known problems at this time.

history.history-entry: The previous version of this translation was mostly the Sri Lanka variant of the language. Updating with the India variant, thanks to Elango Cheran, via Sascha Brawer.
corrections in spelling provided by Shriramana Sharma and Geetha Sambasivam.
stage 4: complete text provided by K. Kalyanasundaram.
stage 2: OHCHR identified as the source.
